Vamprah::
Vamprah rememberd again the advise of the old warrior
who survided The Great War. an insi her mind she
repeated "I'm ready to fight... I'm ready to fight...
"

She tried to calm down and she said to DevilDuel
"Sorry for my weakness while but Darkfate chilss my back..."
